stateMachine.documentation:
# HeaderOrganism State Machine

## Overview
Header context

## Component States

### Logical States

#### isOpenFalse
- **Description**: isOpen is false
- **Triggers**: setIsOpen(false)
- **CSS Classes**: `rotate-180`
- **Props**: `{"isOpen":false}`

#### isOpenTrue
- **Description**: isOpen is true
- **Triggers**: setIsOpen(true)
- **CSS Classes**: `rotate-180`
- **Props**: `{"isOpen":true}`

#### isOpenFalse
- **Description**: isOpen is false
- **Triggers**: setIsOpen(false)
- **CSS Classes**: `rotate-180`
- **Props**: `{"isOpen":false}`

#### isOpenTrue
- **Description**: isOpen is true
- **Triggers**: setIsOpen(true)
- **CSS Classes**: `rotate-180`
- **Props**: `{"isOpen":true}`

#### isVisibleFalse
- **Description**: isVisible is false
- **Triggers**: setIsVisible(false)
- **CSS Classes**: ``
- **Props**: `{"isVisible":false}`

#### isVisibleTrue
- **Description**: isVisible is true
- **Triggers**: setIsVisible(true)
- **CSS Classes**: ``
- **Props**: `{"isVisible":true}`

#### loading
- **Description**: Component is in loading state
- **Triggers**: async action started
- **CSS Classes**: `animate-pulse opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed`
- **Props**: `{"loading":true}`

#### disabled
- **Description**: Component is disabled
- **Triggers**: disabled prop true
- **CSS Classes**: `opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed pointer-events-none`
- **Props**: `{"disabled":true}`

#### error
- **Description**: Component has error state
- **Triggers**: error occurred
- **CSS Classes**: `border-red-500 text-red-600 bg-red-50`
- **Props**: `{"error":true}`

#### success
- **Description**: Component is in success state
- **Triggers**: operation completed
- **CSS Classes**: `border-green-500 text-green-600 bg-green-50`
- **Props**: `{"success":true}`


### CSS States & Styling


#### default
```css
borderColor: var(--color-border);
backgroundColor: var(--color-background);
color: var(--color-text-primary);
```

**Classes**: `border rounded-lg px-4 py-2`  
**Pseudo-states**: :hover, :focus, :active

#### hover
```css
backgroundColor: var(--color-background-hover);
borderColor: var(--color-border-hover);
transform: translateY(-1px);
```

**Classes**: `hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-gray-300`  
**Pseudo-states**: :hover

#### focus
```css
borderColor: var(--color-primary);
borderWidth: 2px;
```

**Classes**: `focus:border-dashed focus:border-2 focus:border-blue-500`  
**Pseudo-states**: :focus, :focus-visible


## State Transitions

```mermaid
stateDiagram-v2
    isOpenFalse : isOpen is false
    isOpenTrue : isOpen is true
    isOpenFalse : isOpen is false
    isOpenTrue : isOpen is true
    isVisibleFalse : isVisible is false
    isVisibleTrue : isVisible is true
    loading : Component is in loading state
    disabled : Component is disabled
    error : Component has error state
    success : Component is in success state
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : Click
    any --> new_state : textValue
    [*] --> default
    default --> hover : mouse enter
    hover --> default : mouse leave
    default --> focus : tab/click
    focus --> default : blur
    default --> loading : async action
    loading --> default : action complete
    default --> error : error occurred
    error --> default : reset
```

## CSS Custom Properties

Following InternetFriends design system:

```css
:root {
  --color-primary: #3b82f6;
  --color-border: #e5e7eb;
  --color-border-hover: #d1d5db;
  --color-background: #ffffff;
  --color-background-hover: #f9fafb;
  --color-text-primary: #111827;
}
```

## Focus States

InternetFriends style focus states use **2px dashed borders**:

```css
.component:focus-visible {
  border: 2px dashed var(--color-primary);
  outline: none;
}
```

## Animation Transitions

```css
.component {
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
}
```

## Usage Examples

```tsx
// Default state
<HeaderOrganism />

// Loading state
<HeaderOrganism loading />

// Error state
<HeaderOrganism error="Something went wrong" />

// Success state
<HeaderOrganism success />
```

## Testing States

```tsx
// Test all states
describe('HeaderOrganism States', () => {
  it('renders default state', () => {
    render(<HeaderOrganism />);
  });
  
  it('renders loading state', () => {
    render(<HeaderOrganism loading />);
  });
  
  it('handles error state', () => {
    render(<HeaderOrganism error="Test error" />);
  });
});
```
